name: Inode
description: The Inode class is used to represent the additional information contained in a Unix file system i-node.

change-time.name: change-time
change-time.description: The time of the last inode change, given by the st_ctime element of "struct stat".

major-device.name: major-device
major-device.description: The major device number of the device the file resides on.

minor-device.name: minor-device
minor-device.description: The minor device number of the device the file resides on.

c-major-device.name: c-major-device
c-major-device.description: The major device of the file itself, if it is a character special device.

c-minor-device.name: c-minor-device
c-minor-device.description: The minor device of the file itself, if it is a character special device.
